languages.text: "Она пожертвовала собой, прикрывая наш прорыв с верхних палуб. Напоследок что-то мне сказать хотела, важное что-то, по глазам видел. Но не успела. Теперь и не узнаю никогда". {n}Кляйн сжимает зубы и страдальчески морщится.{/n}

"She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she didn't get the chance. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Она пожертвовала собой, прикрывая наш прорыв с верхних палуб. Напоследок что-то мне сказать хотела, важное что-то, по глазам видел. Но не успела. Теперь и не узнаю никогда". {n}Кляйн сжимает зубы и страдальчески морщится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "She sacrificed herself, covering our breakout from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something in the end, something important, I could see it in her eyes. But she didn't have time. Now I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winches in pain.{/n}

"She sacrificed herself, covering our breakout from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something in the end, something important, I could see it in her eyes. But she didn't have time. Now I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winches in pain.{/n}

"She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she did not have time. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}

"She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she didn't get the chance. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}

languages.text: «Se sacrificó para cubrir nuestra salida de las cubiertas superiores. Quería decirme algo antes de ello; algo importante, lo veía en sus ojos... pero nunca tuvo oportunidad de hacerlo. Ahora nunca lo sabré». {n}Klein aprieta los dientes y hace una mueca de dolor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she didn't get the chance. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Se sacrificó para cubrir nuestra salida de las cubiertas superiores. Quería decirme algo antes de ello; algo importante, lo veía en sus ojos... pero nunca tuvo oportunidad de hacerlo. Ahora nunca lo sabré». {n}Klein aprieta los dientes y hace una mueca de dolor.{/n}

languages.text: 「彼女は自分を犠牲にして、上層デッキから私たちの出撃を援護してくれました。彼女は何かが起こる前に、私に何か重要なことを伝えようとしていた…そう目が訴えていました…でも、そのチャンスは訪れなかった。今となっては、知る由もありません」{n}クラインは歯を食いしばり、痛みに顔を歪める。{/n}
languages.original_text: "She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she didn't get the chance. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は自分を犠牲にして、上層デッキから私たちの出撃を援護してくれました。彼女は何かが起こる前に、私に何か重要なことを伝えようとしていた…そう目が訴えていました…でも、そのチャンスは訪れなかった。今となっては、知る由もありません」{n}クラインは歯を食いしばり、痛みに顔を歪める。{/n}

languages.text: “我们在上层甲板遇袭的时候，为了掩护我们，她牺牲了性命。暴乱发生之前，她有件事情想告诉我，某件非常重要的事情，我从她的眼神里能看得出来，可她没能找到机会说出口。如今，我再也没机会弄清楚了。”{n}克莱因痛苦地咬紧了牙，皱着眉头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she didn't get the chance. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们在上层甲板遇袭的时候，为了掩护我们，她牺牲了性命。暴乱发生之前，她有件事情想告诉我，某件非常重要的事情，我从她的眼神里能看得出来，可她没能找到机会说出口。如今，我再也没机会弄清楚了。”{n}克莱因痛苦地咬紧了牙，皱着眉头。{/n}

languages.text: "Sie hat sich geopfert und uns Deckung für unseren Ausfall aus den Oberdecks gegeben. Sie wollte mir etwas erzählen, bevor es passiert ist. Etwas Wichtiges, das konnte ich in ihren Augen sehen. Aber es kam nicht mehr dazu. Jetzt werde ich es nie erfahren." {n}Klein beißt die Zähne zusammen und seufzt vor Schmerz auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she didn't get the chance. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie hat sich geopfert und uns Deckung für unseren Ausfall aus den Oberdecks gegeben. Sie wollte mir etwas erzählen, bevor es passiert ist. Etwas Wichtiges, das konnte ich in ihren Augen sehen. Aber es kam nicht mehr dazu. Jetzt werde ich es nie erfahren." {n}Klein beißt die Zähne zusammen und seufzt vor Schmerz auf.{/n}

languages.text: « Elle s'est sacrifiée pour nous permettre de fuir les ponts supérieurs. Elle voulait me dire quelque chose d'important, juste avant que tout parte à vau-l'eau. Je le voyais dans ses yeux. Mais elle n'en a pas eu le temps. Maintenant, je saurai jamais. » {n}Klein serre les dents et grimace de douleur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she didn't get the chance. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Elle s'est sacrifiée pour nous permettre de fuir les ponts supérieurs. Elle voulait me dire quelque chose d'important, juste avant que tout parte à vau-l'eau. Je le voyais dans ses yeux. Mais elle n'en a pas eu le temps. Maintenant, je saurai jamais. » {n}Klein serre les dents et grimace de douleur.{/n}

languages.text: "Üst güvertelerden çıkışımızı sağlamak için kendini feda etti. Öncesinde bana bir şeyler söylemek istemişti, mühim bir şeyler... Gözlerinden anlaşılıyordu. Ama imkânı olmadı. Artık asla bilemeyeceğim." {n}Klein, dişini sıkıp ağlamaklı oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "She sacrificed herself, covering our sally from the upper decks. She wanted to tell me something before it happened, something important — I could see it in her eyes — but she didn't get the chance. Now, I will never know." {n}Klein clenches his teeth and winces in pain.{/n}
